reviewText: This couple has a great approach and are good teachers.

This book is targeted at couples only.  Also, It offered the sexual aspects through v  e  r  y  narrow Christian "correct" attitudes and naive, immature  psychology.  It was euphemistic, and  only dealt with sex with  v  e  r  y  vague innuendos.  They "avoided" and totally missed their opportunity to educate, enlighten, or instruct for human sexual understandings, development, consequences, and self-fulfillment.
